mapper.insert: INSERT INTO G_ADVERS (ADVER_ID, TITLE, ADVER_TYPE, ADVER_IMG, ADVER_CONTENT, LINK_URL, SORT_ORDER, START_TIME, END_TIME, LINK_MAN, LINK_EMAIL, LINK_PHONE, CLICK_COUNT, IS_SHOW, IS_ENABLED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY) VALUES (#{adverId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adverType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adverImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adverContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortOrder,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isShow,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT ADVER_ID, TITLE, ADVER_TYPE, ADVER_IMG, ADVER_CONTENT, LINK_URL, SORT_ORDER, START_TIME, END_TIME, LINK_MAN, LINK_EMAIL, LINK_PHONE, CLICK_COUNT, IS_SHOW, IS_ENABLED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY FROM G_ADVERS
